access_token.description: Temporary access token used for authentication.

private_key.description: Contents of the private key file to be used to authenticate.

content.description: The content of of the dns entry, for example '10 mail', '127.0.0.1' or 'www'.

domain.description: The name, including the tld of the domain.

expire.description: The expiration period of the dns entry, in seconds. For example 86400 for a day of expiration.

name.description: The name of the dns entry, for example '@' or 'www'.

type.description: The type of dns entry. Possbible types are 'A', 'AAAA', 'CAA', 'CNAME', 'MX', 'NS', 'TXT', 'SRV', 'SSHFP' and 'TLSA'.

name.description: The name, including the tld of this domain

description.description: The custom name that can be set by customer.

is_blocked.description: If the Private Network is administratively blocked.

is_locked.description: When locked, another process is already working with this private network.

vps_names.description: The VPSes in this private network.

vps_id.description: VPN name the Private Network is attached to.

creation_date.description: Creation date of the SSH key.

description.description: The name that can be set by customer.

key.description: The public part of the SSH key.

availability_zone.description: The name of the availability zone the VPS is in.

description.description: The name that can be set by customer.

disk_size.description: The VPS disk size in kB.

install_text.description: Base64 encoded preseed / kickstart / cloudinit instructions, when installing unattended.

ipv4_addresses.description: All IPV4 addresses associated with this VPS.

ipv6_addresses.description: All IPV6 addresses associated with this VPS.

is_blocked.description: If the VPS is administratively blocked.

is_customer_locked.description: If this VPS is locked by the customer.

memory_size.description: The VPS memory size in kB.

tags.description: The custom tags added to this VPS.

is_enabled.description: Whether the firewall is enabled for this VPS

whitelist.description: Whitelisted IP's or ranges that are allowed to connect, empty to allow all.

authcode.description: The authcode for this domain as generated by the registry.

cancellation_date.description: Cancellation data, in YYYY-mm-dd h:i:s format, null if the domain is active.

cancellation_status.description: Cancellation status, null if the domain is active, 'cancelled' when the domain is cancelled.

is_dns_only.description: Whether this domain is DNS only.

is_transfer_locked.description: If this domain supports transfer locking, this flag is true when the domains ability to transfer is locked at the registry.

is_whitelabel.description: If this domain is added to your whitelabel.

name.description: The name, including the tld of this domain.

nameservers.description: List of nameservers associated with domain.

registration_date.description: Registration date of the domain, in YYYY-mm-dd format.

renewal_date.description: Next renewal date of the domain, in YYYY-mm-dd format.

tags.description: The custom tags added to this domain.

description.description: The custom name that can be set by customer.

is_blocked.description: If the Private Network is administratively blocked.

is_locked.description: When locked, another process is already working with this privatenetwork.

vps_names.description: The VPSes in this private network.

description.description: The name that can be set by customer.

id.description: The ID of the SSH key.

key.description: The public part of the SSH key.

availability_zone.description: The name of the availability zone the VPS is in.

description.description: The name that can be set by customer.

disk_size.description: The VPS disk size in kB.

ipv4_addresses.description: All IPV4 addresses associated with this VPS.

ipv6_address.description: All IPV6 addresses associated with this VPS.

is_blocked.description: If the VPS is administratively blocked.

is_customer_locked.description: If this VPS is locked by the customer.

is_locked.description: Whether or not another process is already doing stuff with this VPS.

memory_size.description: The VPS memory size in kB.

tags.description: The custom tags added to this VPS.
